scripts.build: rm -rf build; tsx src/build.ts && tsc -p tsconfig.declaration.json && cp build/index.d.ts dist/_index.d.ts && tsc -p tsconfig.build.json && find ./dist -type f -name '*.js' -print0 ! -name '_define.*' ! -name 'index.*' | xargs -0 sed -i '/ts-ignore/d;s/_fa = (require/_fa = __tryRequire(require/' && tsx src/postbuild.ts
